section.title: Formatting expectations
section.p: When present, the content of the short description component is displayed as the first paragraph of a topic. It may also be used for other purposes, such as link previews and summaries.

section.title: XDITA example
section.p: The following example demonstrates the use of an unordered list in an XDITA topic.
section.pre:
What we offer

  • "Know-how" license

  • Warranty of exclusive territory

  • Initial training

  • Support through online, email, and telephone channels

section.title: HDITA example
section.p: The following example demonstrates the use of an unordered list in an HDITA topic.
section.pre:
What we offer

  • "Know-how" license

  • Warranty of exclusive territory

  • Initial training

  • Support through online, email, and telephone channels

section.title: MDITA example
section.p: The following example demonstrates the use of an unordered list in an MDITA topic.
section.pre:
# Make a plan! Start your future today!
1. Contact one of our franchise advisors 2. Pick a location for your restaurant 3. Follow our franchise guide
